name: Kronos (itch) (SomeFormOfHuman)
description: Play as Kronos, a hero with the ability to travel through time, as you come to learn that the timeline has been altered. In the original timeline, there was a team of superheroes that prevented the crime that now devastates the world, but changes in the timeline have erased these heroes from existence. It now falls on you to piece together their origin stories and use your ability to recreate these events and restore the original timeline.
